Comment 2: 
This idea has come up a number of times in the past. We are still considering it.

Our current thinking is that the sugar is sweet but doesn't add much expressibility (it 
only saves one line), and to be really useful you would want to be able to define the 
channel type, and that complicates things a lot.  So the net value is minor.

Still thinking.
_Status changed to **Thinking**._
